name: homarr-iframes
description: Homarr Iframes is an add on for the Homarr dashboard that allows embedding external websites and web apps as iframe widgets. It helps users build richer personal dashboards by integrating many self hosted tools in one view.
features: Iframe Widgets: Embed external websites and web apps directly into Homarr dashboard tiles.
Homarr Integration: Seamlessly extends Homarr dashboard with iframe embedding capabilities.
Multiple Services: Display multiple self-hosted tools in a single unified dashboard view.
Responsive Embedding: Automatically adjust iframe sizes to fit dashboard layout.
Quick Access: Access web interfaces without opening new tabs or windows.
Custom Sizing: Configure iframe dimensions to optimize space usage on your dashboard.
Security Options: Control iframe sandbox settings and permissions for each embedded service.
Dashboard Enhancement: Transform Homarr into a comprehensive control center for all your services.
